授業目的: To build on students' speaking and listening skills, improve vocabulary and enhance self-expression in English.
到達目標: Students should have a reached a higher level of communication competence, and must be able to express themselves confidently in a natural manner.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
The class will be managed with Google Classroom. Please be sure to check there for information regarding the class.

-Listening and Speaking activities based on real life situations
-Pair and small group discussion
-Role playing
-Oral presentations (individual and small group)
